title: The world's most decadent chocolate: would you splash out on a £400 bar?
text:
Chocolate is one of life’s most affordable luxuries. Whether it’s a square of something you’ve loved since childhood or a hand-crafted truffle plucked from an artisan gift box, the good stuff always feels like a treat.

Of course, National Chocolate Week (October 14-20) is no time to scrimp on the stuff. This is a week which celebrates decadent chocolate - the bars and boxes you’ve longed for but haven’t found the right excuse to purchase. Your excuse is here - with all the justification you could ever need.

Why does good chocolate cost more?

Quality-wise, mass-produced chocolate is worlds apart from its bean-to-bar counterparts. Largely, that’s because there’s very little ‘chocolate’ in cheaper...
